price: They will say, “Our Lord, we obeyed our chiefs and our elders[53], but they led us astray from the [right] way.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
footnotes: [53] i.e., our leaders and our dignitaries.
